glsa.title: Hugin: Insecure temporary file creation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Hugin, potentially allowing for a Denial of Service.

background.p: Hugin is a GUI for creating and processing panoramic images.

description.p: Suse Linux reported that Hugin creates the "hugin_debug_optim_results.txt" temporary file in an insecure manner.

impact.p: A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability with a symlink attack, potentially overwriting an arbitrary file with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Hugin users should upgrade to the latest version:
